Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute near Harrison/Francisco
ShortDescription: #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Harrison/Francisco, due to police activity near Harrison/Francisco.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Harrison/Francisco, due to police activity near Harrison/Francisco.

Eastbound #7 Harrison buses will operate via Harrison, Sacramento, Congress Parkway, California, Harrison and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.
